short_summary: The contracting authority has a requirement for a regional standing offer for fire extinguisher inspection and maintenance services for Camrose and Smoky Lake, Alberta.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Real Property Operations Unit (Atlantic) in Halifax, Nova Scotia has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the inspection, refill and hydrostatic testing of Portable CO2 Extinguishers, for units within Maritime Forces Atlantic geographical regions.   This RISO will be from April 1, 2024 or issuance of standing offer to March 31, 2026 with two (2), one (1) year optional periods.   There are no Security requirement with this Solicitation.   Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Reference the solicitation for further details.   Reference the solicitation for further details.
duration_in_months: Well Documented Testimony-PDF Manual  & Labour&By Default NPcare
full_summary:
### RFSO - Fire Extinguisher Maintenance
#### Title
Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - WS4422650262-Doc4447255766

#### Issued By
* Issued by: Department of Public Works and Government Services, PSPC
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Canada

#### Issued For
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Real Property Operations Unit (Atlantic)
* Halifax, Nova Scotia

#### Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada seeks a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide inspection, refill and hydrostatic testing services for Portable CO2 Extinguishers for Maritime Forces Atlantic units within their geographical regions. The RISO will be in effect from April 1, 2024, or issuance of the standing offer to March 31, 2026, with two optional one-year periods.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection process will be based on the lowest price.

#### Tender Details
* Tender Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18817259?extsite=MTg4MTcyNTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-04T14:00:00
* amendment Date: 2024-04-02
* expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-01

#### Contact
If you have any inquires, please contact:
* Chantal Blanchard (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Let me know if this rewritten text meets your satisfaction. Good day! 





Effective March 31, the contract will be subject to the Canada Compliance  Commercial Agreement Rules Chapter 17 Notification.
